verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are the <S%H8549>undefiled<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
They <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity:<s%> they <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> <S%H3966>diligently.<s%>
O <S%H305>that<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> were <S%H3559>directed<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes!<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> when I have <S%H5027>respect<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> when I shall have <S%H3925>learned<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes:<s%> O <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5704>utterly.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>
Wherewithal <S%H4100><s%> shall a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2135>cleanse<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H734>way?<s%> by taking <S%H8104>heed<s%> thereto according to thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
With my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> have I <S%H1875>sought<s%> thee: O let me <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7686>wander<s%> from thy <S%H4480>commandments.<s%> <S%H4687><s%>
Thy <S%H565>word<s%> have I <S%H6845>hid<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I might <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against thee.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> art <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
With my <S%H8193>lips<s%> have I <S%H5608>declared<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> <S%H5921>as<s%> much as in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> and have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto thy <S%H734>ways.<s%>
I will delight <S%H8173>myself<s%> in thy <S%H2708>statutes:<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
Deal <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that I may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
Open <S%H1540><s%> thou mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that I may <S%H5027>behold<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>law.<s%> <S%H8451><s%>
I <S%H595><s%> am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1638>breaketh<s%> for the <S%H8375>longing<s%> that it hath <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> that are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> which do <S%H7686>err<s%> from thy <S%H4480>commandments.<s%> <S%H4687><s%>
Remove <S%H1556><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
Princes <S%H8269><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> did <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against me: but thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> did <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> are my <S%H8191>delight<s%> and my <S%H376>counselors.<s%> <S%H6098><s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H6083>dust:<s%> <S%H2421>quicken<s%> thou me according to thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have <S%H5608>declared<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and thou <S%H6030>heardest<s%> me: <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Make me to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> so shall I <S%H7878>talk<s%> of thy wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1811>melteth<s%> for <S%H4480>heaviness:<s%> <S%H8424><s%> <S%H6965>strengthen<s%> thou me according unto thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
Remove <S%H5493><s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8267>lying:<s%> and grant me thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H2603>graciously.<s%>
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H530>truth:<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> have I <S%H7737>laid<s%> before me.
I have <S%H1692>stuck<s%> unto thy <S%H5715>testimonies:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> put me <S%H408>not<s%> to <S%H954>shame.<s%>
I will <S%H7323>run<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H2706>statutes;<s%> and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> it unto the <S%H6118>end.<s%>
Give me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H8451>law;<s%> yea, I shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> it with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Make me to <S%H1869>go<s%> in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> therein do I <S%H2654>delight.<s%>
Incline <S%H5186><s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> and <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H4480>beholding<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H7723>vanity;<s%> and <S%H2421>quicken<s%> thou me in thy <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Establish <S%H6965><s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is devoted to thy <S%H3374>fear.<s%>
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3025>fear:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H2896>good.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have <S%H8373>longed<s%> after thy <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Let thy <S%H2617>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> also unto me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even thy <S%H8668>salvation,<s%> according to thy <S%H565>word.<s%>
So shall I have <S%H1697>wherewith<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>

And <S%H5337>take<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5704>utterly<s%> <S%H3966><s%> out of my <S%H4480>mouth;<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thy <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
So shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> at <S%H7342>liberty:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H1875>seek<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> of thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
And I will delight <S%H8173>myself<s%> in thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H157>loved.<s%>

My <S%H3709>hands<s%> also will I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H157>loved;<s%> and I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast caused me to <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is my <S%H5165>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> hath <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have had me <S%H5704>greatly<s%> <S%H3966><s%> in <S%H3887>derision:<s%> yet have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5186>declined<s%> from thy <S%H4480>law.<s%> <S%H8451><s%>
I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of <S%H4480>old,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and have comforted <S%H5162>myself.<s%>
Horror <S%H2152><s%> hath taken hold <S%H270>upon<s%> me because of the <S%H4480>wicked<s%> <S%H7563><s%> that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage.<s%>
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and have <S%H8104>kept<s%> thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> I <S%H1961>had,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Thou art my <S%H2506>portion,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> that I would <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H1697>words.<s%>
I <S%H2470>entreated<s%> thy <S%H6440>favor<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me according to thy <S%H565>word.<s%>
I <S%H2803>thought<s%> on my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
I made <S%H2363>haste,<s%> and <S%H4102>delayed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
The <S%H2256>bands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5749>robbed<s%> me: but I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee because <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> am a <S%H2270>companion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, and of them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according unto thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
Teach <S%H3925><s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>judgment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H539>believed<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
Before <S%H2962><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> I went <S%H7683>astray:<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H8104>kept<s%> thy <S%H565>word.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> art <S%H2896>good,<s%> and doest <S%H2895>good;<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H2950>forged<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: but <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H2954>fat<s%> as <S%H2459>grease;<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H8173>delight<s%> in thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me <S%H3588>that<s%> I have been <S%H6031>afflicted;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I might <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> unto me than <S%H4480>thousands<s%> <S%H505><s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H3559>fashioned<s%> me: give me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
They that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> me; <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>right,<s%> and that thou in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me.
Let, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> thy merciful <S%H2617>kindness<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> for my <S%H5162>comfort,<s%> according to thy <S%H565>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
Let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto me, that I may <S%H2421>live:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight.<s%>

Let the <S%H2086>proud<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they dealt <S%H5791>perversely<s%> with me without a <S%H8267>cause:<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Let those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto me, and those that have <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
Let my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8549>sound<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3615>fainteth<s%> for thy <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> but I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word.<s%>
Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> for thy <S%H565>word,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> wilt thou <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me?
For <S%H3588><s%> I am <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke;<s%> yet do I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
How <S%H4100>many<s%> are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant?<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> wilt thou <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me?
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H3738>digged<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for me, <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> after thy <S%H8451>law.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful:<s%> they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully;<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> thou me.
They had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> me upon <S%H776>earth;<s%> but <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me after thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness;<s%> so shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Forever, <S%H5769><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is unto all <S%H1755>generations:<s%> <S%H1755><s%> thou hast <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H5975>abideth.<s%>
They <S%H5975>continue<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> according to thine <S%H4941>ordinances:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> are thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
Unless <S%H3884><s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> had been my <S%H8191>delights,<s%> I should <S%H227>then<s%> have <S%H6>perished<s%> in mine <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> with them thou hast <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
